content: to end of round round 2 *sl1yo brp1 * repeat to end of round next repeat rnd1 and rnd2 11 13 14 more times ending with rnd1 begin two color brioche pattern join cc yarn for the set up round part 1 set up round cc wyib * sl1yo brp1* repeat to end of round drop cc yarn in front round 3 mc *brk1 sl1yo* repeat to end of round drop mc yarn in front round 3 cc * sl1yo brp1* repeat repeat rnd3 mc and rnd3 cc 11 13 14 more times ending with round 3 cc part 2 round 4 cc *brk1 sl1yo* repeat round 4 mc *sl1yo brp1* repeat repeat round 4 cc and round 4 mc 11 13 14 more times ending with round 4 mc crown break mc yarn continue with cc yarn switch to double pointed needles if necessary round 1 *brk1 sl1yo* repeat round 2 *sl1yo brp1* repeat repeat rnd1 and rnd2 2 3 4 more times ending with round 2 round 3 *brk1 sl1yo brlsldec sl1yo brk1 sl1yo 5 7 9 times brrsldec sl1yo* repeat 2 more times to end of round 12 sts decreased 48 sts 60 72 sts remain round 4 *sl1yo brp1* repeat round 5 *brk1 sl1yo* repeat round 6 *sl1yo brp1* repeat ohboy 3 all rights reserved ©2015 katrinschubert round 7 *brk1 sl1yo brlsldec sl1yo brk1 sl1yo 3 5 7 times brrsldec sl1yo* repeat 12 sts decreased 36 48 60 sts remain round 8 *sl1yo brp1* repeat round 9 *brk1 sl1yo* repeat round 10 *sl1yo brp1* repeat round 11 *brk1 sl1yo brlsldec sl1yo brk1 sl1yo 1 3 5 times brrsldec sl1yo* repeat 12 sts decreased 24 36 48 sts remain round 12 *sl1yo brp1* repeat round 13 *brk1 sl1yo* repeat round 14 *sl1yo brp1* repeat size s only jump to round 23 round 15 *brk1 sl1yo brlsldec sl1yo brk1 sl1yo _ 1 3 times brrsldec sl1yo* repeat 12 sts decreased _ 24 36 sts remain round 16 *sl1yo brp1* repeat round 17 *brk1 sl1yo* repeat round 18 *sl1yo brp1* repeat size m only jump to round 23 round 19*brk1 sl1yo brlsldec sl1yo brk1 sl1yo brrsldec sl1yo* repeat 12 sts decreased _ _ 24 sts remain round 20 *sl1yo brp1* repeat round 21 *brk1 sl1yo* repeat round 22 *sl1yo brp1* repeat round 23 * brk1 sl1yo br4stdec sl1yo* repeat 12 sts decreased 12 sts remain round 24 * sl1yo brp1 * repeat round 25 * ssk * 6 sts remain finishing break yarn and place on tapestry needle weave strand through the remaining 6 sts and pull close weave in ends separately wet or steam block to smooth brioche stitches and crown carefully © katrinschubert 2015 in purchasing this pattern you agree to print and use this pattern only for your
